20101217200541.000|20101217200543.500|CCO|FRANKLIN WAS ALLEGEDLY ACTIVE.

20101217200548.500|20101217200551.000|CCO|THE MID '80s WHEN THEY USED 
20101217200551.000|20101217200556.000|CCO|BALLISTICS TESTING ON A GUN TO 
20101217200556.000|20101217200601.000|CCO|LINK SEVEN BODIES, SEVEN FEMALES
20101217200601.000|20101217200603.000|CCO|BEING KILLED BACK FROM '85 TO 
20101217200603.000|20101217200605.000|CCO|'88.
20101217200605.000|20101217200607.000|CCO|AFTER '88, THE TRAIL GOES COLD.
20101217200607.000|20101217200609.000|CCO|NOT UNTIL 2002 AND 2003 WHEN DNA
20101217200609.000|20101217200611.000|CCO|TESTING WHICH WASN'T AVAILABLE 
20101217200611.000|20101217200612.667|CCO|IN THE MID 80s LINKS TWO MORE 
20101217200612.667|20101217200614.333|CCO|BODIES.
20101217200614.333|20101217200616.000|CCO|AND THEN AGAIN USING BALLISTICS 
20101217200616.000|20101217200617.667|CCO|TESTING AND DNA TESTING, THEY 
20101217200617.667|20101217200619.333|CCO|LINK THEM BACK TO THE EARLIER 
20101217200619.333|20101217200621.000|CCO|SET OF KILLINGS.
20101217200621.000|20101217200622.667|CCO|THEN AGAIN IN 2007, ANOTHER 
20101217200622.667|20101217200624.333|CCO|BODY.

20101217200626.000|20101217200627.667|CCO|BODY.

20101217200629.333|20101217200631.000|CCO|THEY DUBBED HIM THE GRIM SLEEPER

20101217200632.667|20101217200634.333|CCO|SLEEP.

20101217200715.286|20101217200716.714|CCO|OR INDIVIDUALLY?
20101217200716.714|20101217200718.143|CCO|DO YOU EVEN KNOW?
20101217200718.143|20101217200719.571|CCO|>> YEAH.
20101217200719.571|20101217200721.000|CCO|THEY WERE FOUND -- WE KNOW THAT 
20101217200721.000|20101217200722.667|CCO|THEY WERE FOUND PREDOMINANTLY IN
20101217200722.667|20101217200724.333|CCO|A TRAILER THAT FRANKLIN HAD IN 
20101217200724.333|20101217200726.000|CCO|HIS BACKYARD.
20101217200726.000|20101217200727.667|CCO|HE HAD A SMALL HOUSE IN SOUTH 
20101217200727.667|20101217200729.333|CCO|L.A. THAT HE LIVED IN WITH HIS 
20101217200729.333|20101217200731.000|CCO|WIFE IN THE BACKYARD.
20101217200731.000|20101217200733.000|CCO|THERE WAS A TRAILER AND A GARAGE
20101217200733.000|20101217200735.000|CCO|AND SEVERAL CARS IN VARIOUS 
20101217200735.000|20101217200737.000|CCO|STATES OF DISREPAIR.
20101217200737.000|20101217200739.000|CCO|HE WAS KNOWN AS SORT OF THE 
20101217200739.000|20101217200741.000|CCO|LOCAL FENCE WHERE YOU COULD GO
